description: Dimensions of graded algebra associated with meanders.
references: B. Bobier and J. Sawada, A fast algorithm to generate open meandric systems and meanders, ACM Transactions on Algorithms, Vol. 6, No. 2, 2010, article #42.
links: B. Bobier and J. Sawada, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..28 [from preprint above]
